sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, OnInit, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Patient } from 'src/app/models/patient.model'; import { PatientsService } from 'src/app/services/patients.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-registration-form', templateUrl: './registration-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./registration-form.component.scss'], }) export class RegistrationFormComponent implements OnInit { @Input() isModalOpen: boolean = false; @Output() isModalOpenChange = new EventEmitter(); registerPatientForm: FormGroup = this.fb.group({}) buidForm(): void { this.registerPatientForm = this.fb.group({ firstName: ['', Validators.required], lastName: ['', Validators.required], personalId: ['', Validators.required], dateOfBirth: ['', Validators.required], phoneNumber: ['', Validators.required], email: ['', Validators.required], medicalConditions: [''], surgicalHistory: [''], medications: [''], allergies: [''], immunizations: [''], doctorsName: ['', Validators.required], doctorsSurname: ['', Validators.required], insurance: [false], }); } ngOnInit(): void { this.buidForm(); } patientFields: string[] = [ 'first name', 'last name', 'personal id', 'date of birth', 'phone number', 'email', 'medical conditions', 'surgical history', 'medications', 'allergies', 'immunizations', `doctor's name`, `doctor's surname`, ]; openModal() { this.resetForm(); this.isModalOpenChange.emit(true); } close() { this.resetForm(); this.isModalOpenChange.emit(false); } preventClose(event: Event) { event.stopPropagation(); } private resetForm() { this.registerPatientForm.reset(); } constructor( private patientsService: PatientsService, private fb: FormBuilder ) { } registerPatient() { console.log('Patient form:', this.registerPatientForm); if (this.registerPatientForm.valid) { console.log('Patient form data:', this.registerPatientForm.value); // Now you can use this.registerPatientForm.value to send data to the service. } else { // If the form is invalid, show an error message alert('Please fill in all the required fields.'); } } } // registerPatient() { // console.log('Patient form:', this.patientForm) // if (this.patientForm.valid) { // // If the form is valid, submit the data // console.log('Patient form data:', this.patientForm.value); // // this.patientsService.addNewPatient(this.newPatient).subscribe({ // // next: (response) => { // // console.log('Patient registered successfully:', response); // // this.close(); // // }, // // error: (error) => { // // console.error('Error registering patient:', error); // // }, // // }); // } else { // // If the form is invalid, show an error message // alert('Please fill in all the required fields.'); // } // } // }
